code: import React,{useState}from'react';import NumberInputForm from'./components/NumberInputForm';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const[dataframe,setDataframe]=useState([]);const handleFormSubmit=async formData=>{const response=await fetch('http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/generate_dataframe',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(formData)});const result=await response.json();setDataframe(result);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container mx-auto p-7",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-3xl font-bold mb-4",children:"Home Page"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NumberInputForm,{onSubmit:handleFormSubmit}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("pre",{className:"mt-4",children:JSON.stringify(dataframe,null,2)})]});};export default App;
